alert.note: Alert for Southern Mountains; Zion National Park (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 23 at 11:29AM MST until February 24 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches in the Virgin, Rockville, and Springdale areas. Additional snow accumulations of 10 to 20 inches with locally higher amounts in northern, higher elevations of the park. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Zion National Park. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult at times through Friday.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx.
